title: Game Progress Route
content:
a new quest called"Rescue Wulbren". You can respond with:

Would this have anything to do with Runepowder? Spare the secrecy. Philomeen already escaped with the Runepowder Before you ask, no - I'm not going to stage a rescue Whatever the cult wants, I want the opposite. We need to free your friend.

Select the first one and Beldron will be surprised of your knowledge. You'll learn that Wulbren discovered the runepowder formula first and the Absolutists have taken him to interrogate his knowledg
